sourcesContent:
import { IonButton, IonCheckbox, IonCol, IonContent, IonFooter, IonGrid, IonHeader, IonIcon, IonItem, IonItemDivider, IonLabel, IonList, IonModal, IonPage, IonRouterLink, IonRow, IonSearchbar, IonSegment, IonSegmentButton, IonText, IonTextarea, IonTitle, IonToolbar } from "@ionic/react"; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faClock, faCommentAlt } from "@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons"; import { addCircleSharp, personSharp } from "ionicons/icons"; import "../../css/Global.css"; import "../../css/Forum.css"; import TopNav from '../../components/TopNav'; import ForumRules from '../../components/Forum/ForumRules'; import Forum_FlagModal from "../../components/Forum/Forum_FlagModal"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Forum: React.FC = () => { const { register, errors, handleSubmit } = useForm(); const [checked, setChecked] = useState(false); const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [showPostModal, setShowPostModal] = useState(false); let history = useHistory(); const [modalSegmentValue, setModalSegmentValue] = useState(''); const onSubmit = () => { setCount(1); setChecked(true); } return ( {count === 1 && checked === true ? <> All Discussions {/* Display all Questions */} Anyone going to enrol for the Cyber Security (University of Wollongong) course? ~ Martin John 21-11-2020, 5.30pm 0 Where's the ATM? ~ John Tan 21-11-2020, 10.00am 1 {/* End of Display all Questions */} :
*Important Notice* Forum Rules This forum is strictly for discussion about programmes offered by SIM and its partner universities and SIM Open House. Please adhere to the following rules before posting in the forum. 1. Remain respectful of other users at all times. 2. Please do not spam. The definition of spam is an irrelevant or advertising post. Any post that is considered spam will be removed. 3. Do not post offensive posts, links or images. 4. Please do not post threads text in all CAPITALS since this is considered to be shouting. Anyone who breaks any of the above rules will be banned from the forum. Let's keep this forum safe for everyone. setChecked(e.detail.checked)} ref={register({ validate: (value) => checked === true })}> *I have read the above forum rules and agree to abide to the rules stated above. I understand that should I break any of the rules above, I may be banned from the forum. {errors.forumCheckbox && errors.forumCheckbox.type === "validate" &&
*Please check the above after reading the rules to proceed to the forum
} PROCEED TO FORUM
} {/* Post Question Modal */} setShowPostModal(false)}> Post Question [setShowPostModal(false), setModalSegmentValue('')]}>CLOSE POST {/* Bottom Tabs */} {count === 1 && checked === true ? <> console.log(`${e.detail.value}`)}> [setShowPostModal(true), setModalSegmentValue('postQuestionBtn')]}> {e.preventDefault(); history.push('/u/forumUser');}}> : '' } ); }; export default Forum;
